question: Which institution published “Connecting to Thrive: Challenges and Opportunities of Transport Integration in Eastern South Asia” report?
explanation:
The World Bank has released a report titled – “Connecting to Thrive: Challenges and Opportunities of Transport Integration in Eastern South Asia”.
The report makes a special analysis on Motor Vehicles Agreement (MVA) signed by Bangladesh-Bhutan-India-Nepal (BBIN) and labels it as crucial for creating cross border integration.
